2055060.name: Charming Blood
2055060.description:
Release version will contain:

  • Expanded world lore with rich details.

  • Enhanced animations and additional CG scenes.

  • A total of 36 unique endings.

  • A CG gallery to revisit unlocked scenes.

  • Steam achievements will be introduced in the full release.

Price will increase after release. No price changes are planned during Early Access.

CURRENT PROGRESS: 7/12 GAME DAYS COMPLETED

Thank you for joining our development journey! ❤️

---

Step into a world where darkness holds both danger and desire. As night falls, vampires emerge from the shadows – beings who have lived secretly alongside humanity for centuries. But now, their carefully guarded secrets are about to unravel...

You are an ordinary young man thrown into an extraordinary existence when you're transformed into a vampire against your will. As ancient powers stir and war looms among the night dwellers, you must adapt to your newfound supernatural life while navigating complex relationships with four captivating vampires:

Victoria, your seemingly gentle neighbor whose helpful nature masks deeper passions waiting to be awakened

Mina, a free spirit who scorns rules and boundaries, eager to show you the thrills of vampire society – but her alluring fire may leave you burned

Alex, a proud vampire hunter from the ruling clan who reluctantly needs your help. Perhaps you'll be the one to breach her icy defenses?

Erika, the mysterious and commanding leader of the Children of Darkness. Her word is law among the city's vampires, but what secrets lie behind her stern façade?

---

Your choices will shape not only your path through vampire society but also your relationships with these compelling characters. Will you embrace the darkness within, or forge your own destiny in this world of shadows and passion?

[This is a story-rich vampire romance visual novel with multiple paths and endings. Your decisions matter.]
